Collection.name: Records
Collection.type: Eamon.ThirdParty.BTree`1[[Eamon.Framework.IEffect, Eamon, Version=1.4.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]], Eamon, Version=1.4.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: As you approach the chest, it suddenly comes alive and two tentacles come out of the sides, holding you fast. Another tentacle rises from the top and attempts to hurt you.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: As the pirate mutters a word you can't hear, bright green flames surround the blade of his sword.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: As the pirate chokes and dies, the flame on his sword also dies.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: As you say the sword's name, bright green flames appear around the blade.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Since you were carrying the sword when it ignited, you took some burn damage until the sword (hearing your cries of pain?) extinguished its flame.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: As you say the sword's name, the bright green flame disappears from it.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: As you read the book, you feel a weird sensation overtaking you. You are turning into a small fish!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have no trouble finding a horse that you, well, borrow to take you to the site of your first adventure. You follow several signs which lead you to the Beginner's Cave.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: He shakes his head and says, "You must have at least one weapon to adventure here! Go back to the Main Hall."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: As you stand there, the local Knight Marshal comes out to inspect you.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: He shakes his head and says, "You are not a beginner! You cannot adventure here! Go back to the Main Hall."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Eventually the Knight Marshal says, "You may now proceed." He then walks away.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: He tells you, "You may only take one weapon into the cave. Which shall it be?"

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: When you realize the book contains glyphs relating to transmutation, you pause to reconsider your choice. Dare you read further?

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Your curiosity gets the better of you.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: See EAMON CS 1.4 NEW COMMANDS for additional details.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: floor and you can GET ALL.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: to remove from or add to the container.

Collection.name: FreeUids
